text: E ma se ba ahlul-kitab sariyan jiyan afi ni ona t’o dara julo (eyi ni lilo al-Ƙur’an ati hadith. E ma si se ja won logun) afi awon t’o ba sabosi ninu won. Ki e si so pe: “A gbagbo ninu ohun ti Won sokale fun awa ati ohun ti Won sokale fun eyin. Olohun wa ati Olohun yin, (Allahu) Okan soso ni. Awa si ni musulumi (olujuwo-juse-sile) fun Un.”
